channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Building Jetflow: a framework for flexible, performant data pipelines at Cloudflare】构建Jetflow：Cloudflare的灵活高效数据管道框架
item.description: 【 Faced with a data-ingestion challenge at a massive scale, Cloudflare's Business Intelligence team built a new framework called Jetflow. 】面对大规模的数据摄入挑战，Cloudflare 的商业智能团队构建了一个名为 Jetflow 的新框架。

item.title: 【Serverless Statusphere: a walk through building serverless ATProto applications on Cloudflare’s Developer Platform】无服务器状态球：在 Cloudflare 开发者平台上构建无服务器 ATProto 应用程序的指南
item.description: 【 Build and deploy real-time, decentralized Authenticated Transfer Protocol (ATProto) apps on Cloudflare Workers. 】在 Cloudflare Workers 上构建和部署实时的、去中心化的认证传输协议（ATProto）应用。

item.title: 【Partnering with OpenAI to bring their new open models onto Cloudflare Workers AI】与OpenAI合作，将他们的新开放模型带到Cloudflare Workers AI上
item.description: 【 OpenAI’s newest open-source models are now available on Cloudflare Workers AI on Day 0, with support for Responses API, Code Interpreter and Web Search (coming soon). 】OpenAI最新开源模型现已在Cloudflare Workers AI上于Day 0推出，支持响应API、代码解释器和网络搜索（即将推出）。

item.title: 【Vulnerability disclosure on SSL for SaaS v1 (Managed CNAME)】SSL 问题披露适用于 SaaS v1（托管 CNAME）
item.description: 【 An upcoming vulnerability disclosure in Cloudflare’s SSL for SaaSv1 is detailed, explaining the steps we’ve taken towards deprecation. 】Cloudflare 的 SaaSv1 SSL 中的一个即将公布的漏洞披露情况已详细说明，解释了我们为弃用该服务所采取的步骤。

item.title: 【Redesigning Workers KV for increased availability and faster performance】重新设计Workers KV以提高可用性和更快的性能
item.description: 【 Workers KV is Cloudflare's global key-value store. After the incident on June 12, we re-architected KV’s redundant storage backend, remove single points of failure, and make substantial improvements. 】Workers KV 是 Cloudflare 的全球键值存储。在 6 月 12 日事件之后，我们重新设计了 KV 的冗余存储后端，消除了单点故障，并进行了重大改进。

item.title: 【Cloudflare protects against critical SharePoint vulnerability, CVE-2025-53770】Cloudflare 保护防止关键 SharePoint 漏洞 CVE-2025-53770
item.description: 【 Microsoft disclosed two critical vulnerabilities, CVE-2025-53771 and CVE-2025-53770, that are exploited to attack SharePoint servers. 】微软披露了两个关键漏洞CVE-2025-53771和CVE-2025-53770，这些漏洞被用于攻击SharePoint服务器。

item.title: 【The White House AI Action Plan: a new chapter in U.S. AI policy】美国白宫人工智能行动方案：美国人工智能政策的新篇章
item.description: 【 The White House AI Action Plan is a pivotal policy document outlining the current administration's priorities and deliverables in AI to establish American AI as the gold standard for AI worldwide. 】白宫人工智能行动方案是一项关键政策文件，概述了当前政府在人工智能领域的优先事项和成果，以确立美国人工智能作为全球人工智能的黄金标准。

item.title: 【Reducing double spend latency from 40 ms to < 1 ms on privacy proxy】将隐私代理上的双重花费延迟从40毫秒减少到小于1毫秒
item.description: 【 We significantly sped up our privacy proxy service by fixing a 40ms delay in "double-spend" checks. 】我们通过修复“双花”检查中的40毫秒延迟，显著加快了我们的隐私代理服务。

item.title: 【Perplexity is using stealth, undeclared crawlers to evade website no-crawl directives】困惑正在使用隐秘的、未声明的爬虫来规避网站的不爬取指令
item.description: 【 Perplexity is repeatedly modifying their user agent and changing IPs and ASNs to hide their crawling activity, in direct conflict with explicit no-crawl preferences expressed by websites. 】困惑性不断修改其用户代理并更改IP地址和ASNs以隐藏其抓取活动，这与网站明确表达的不抓取偏好直接冲突。

item.title: 【Shutdown season: the Q2 2025 Internet disruption summary】停机季节：2025年第二季度互联网中断总结
item.description: 【 In Q2 2025, we observed Internet disruptions around the world resulting from government-directed shutdowns, power outages, cable damage, a cyberattack, and technical problems. 】在2025年第二季度，我们观察到由于政府主导的断网、停电、电缆损坏、网络攻击和技术问题，全球出现了互联网中断的情况。
